Description:
Job descriptionYour Mission:This is an Engineering position within the line of Smart systems business reporting to the Operations Manager. The primary job function is to manage, maintain and upgrade our customers control projects which may consist of one or many of the following but are not limited to these protocols KNX, DALI Control, BACnet, Modbus, Niagara, Desigo, TCP/IP, etc. As a Systems Engineers you would also be responsible for supporting other engineers or sales within the organizationYour responsibilities:Team Project ManagementCoordinating, preparing, and fault-finding project solutions and maintaining them:
Being able to design & engineer building control/automation systems and support others with theirs
Working with bus systems and technologies such as KNX, BACnet, Modbus & Tridium Niagara.
Building and maintaining systems software & configurations (ETS)
Delivery of Training to customers and other team members
Supporting the execution of projects:
Scheduling equipment for projects (PPM critical Spares & minor works)
Pre-configuring and downloading equipment prior to delivery.
Communication with customers:
Liaising with customers regarding queries for your own and other team members
Writing and preparation of project-related documentation
Working with AutoCAD drawings in coordination with the Pre-sales engineer:
Updating of schematics, layouts, topology drawings, and other associated details
Reading and working from schematic and engineering drawingsSkills
Skills:
Experience in a similar Engineering environment
Experience with KNX, DALI Control, BACnet, Modbus, Niagara A,X or any other platform
Project Engineering background - not essential but desirable
IT /networking skills and Delivery of Training
Electrical/Electronic qualification bachelor's or Masters
KNX Partner qualification
